title: Sticky spare ribs
ingredients: ['12 meaty pork spare ribs, about 900 g (2 lb) in total', '3 tbsp red wine vinegar', '2 tsp sunflower oil', 'large strip of orange zest', '150 ml (5 fl oz) orange juice', '1 tbsp tomato purée', '2 tbsp dark soft brown sugar', '2 tbsp Worcestershire sauce', '1 tbsp French mustard', '½–1 tsp chilli powder, or to taste']
